title: Frontend News #39
body:
Frontend News aims to keep you updated with what's happening in the world of web dev! With the latest news and resources from the design & development community.
![Clip path effect](/images/uploads/clip-path-effect-min.png) [Let’s Create an Image Pop-Out Effect With SVG Clip Path](https://css-tricks.com/lets-create-an-image-pop-out-effect-with-svg-clip-path/) If you haven’t used clip-path or you are unfamiliar with it, it basically allows us to specify a display region for an element based on a clipping path and hide portions of the element that fall outside the clip-path. This article walks us through the process! [Read it ➡️](https://css-tricks.com/lets-create-an-image-pop-out-effect-with-svg-clip-path/)
![Arc dev ](/images/uploads/arc-logo-news-min.png) [15 Best Platforms to Find Freelance Work](https://www.easeout.co/blog/2021-04-25-15-best-platforms-to-find-freelance-work/) Platforms (Upwork, Codementor, etc) are an ideal place to find clients when you’re new to freelancing and you haven’t yet built your own client base. It’s important to choose the right platform based on your skills. So here’s a comparison of the top freelancing platforms today. [Check them out ➡️](https://www.easeout.co/blog/2021-04-25-15-best-platforms-to-find-freelance-work/)
![SiteGround Logo](/images/uploads/siteground-news-ad.jpg) [](https://jscharting.com/)[Looking for low-cost, reliable web hosting?](https://www.siteground.com/index.htm?afcode=72c71e3c78bce5ad69eb37d60c7a5de4) SiteGround are running a discount where you can get a hosting account for up to 62% off. With the basic plan, that’s only $6.99 a month!
![React Authentication & Access Control](/images/uploads/react-authentication-min.png) [React Authentication & Access Control](https://css-tricks.com/react-authentication-access-control/) Authentication and access control are required for most applications, but they often distract us from building core features. In this article, we'll see a straightforward way to add auth and access control in React. [Read it ➡️](https://css-tricks.com/react-authentication-access-control/)
![Clubhouse Logo Design](/images/uploads/clubhouse-design-min.png) [How Clubhouse breaks the monotony through its app icon](https://uxdesign.cc/how-clubhouse-breaks-the-monotony-through-its-app-icon-4b9e277b6838) We have Instagram for photos, YouTube for videos, Spotify for music and podcasts, but now Clubhouse came in to compete with Discord and joins in the club and fills that gap by being a voice-only live interactions application, adding an extra dimension to the social media space. [Read it ➡️](https://uxdesign.cc/how-clubhouse-breaks-the-monotony-through-its-app-icon-4b9e277b6838)
![Creating a Smart Navbar With Vanilla JavaScript Article](/images/uploads/smart-navbar-min.png) [Creating a Smart Navbar With Vanilla JavaScript](https://css-tricks.com/creating-a-smart-navbar-with-vanilla-javascript/) Sticky, or fixed, navigation is a popular design choice because it gives users persistent access to navigate the site. On the other hand, it takes up space on the page and sometimes covers content in a way that’s less than appealing. A possible solution? Smart navigation! [Read it ➡️](https://css-tricks.com/creating-a-smart-navbar-with-vanilla-javascript/)
![SEO Retro Logo](/images/uploads/seo-canonical-tags-min.jpeg) [SEO: All You Need to Know About Canonical Tags](https://www.bestfreewebresources.com/seo-all-you-need-to-know-about-canonical-tags) The subject of canonical tags seems to create an air of confusion for many. Fortunately, we are here to tell you all you need to know about canonical tags in this article. [Read it ➡️](https://www.bestfreewebresources.com/seo-all-you-need-to-know-about-canonical-tags)
![Evaluating Headless CMS Options](/images/uploads/cms-options-min.png) [Don’t Lose Your Head: Evaluating Headless](https://www.smashingmagazine.com/2021/04/evaluating-headless/) With the explosion in popularity of the Jamstack has come the proliferation of new options for managing your content. [Headless](https://www.smashingmagazine.com/2021/03/going-headless-use-cases/) has become quite the hot topic in development circles of late, but where do you start if you are embarking on a new project and haven’t yet decided where to store and organize your content? [Read it ➡️](https://www.smashingmagazine.com/2021/04/evaluating-headless/)
![Seven Mistakes To Avoid In Your Technical Interviews Article](/images/uploads/mistakes-technical-interviews-min.jpeg) [Seven Mistakes To Avoid In Your Technical Interviews](https://www.smashingmagazine.com/2021/04/mistakes-technical-interviews/) It’s no secret that the technical interview process leaves something to be desired; it’s often riddled with anxiety and stress. In this article, we’ll see seven of the most common mistakes candidates make in their technical interviews and explore ways you can avoid them. [Read it ➡️](https://www.smashingmagazine.com/2021/04/mistakes-technical-interviews/)
![Code wall ](/images/uploads/complex-code-min.png) [Creating an Editable Textarea That Supports Syntax-Highlighted Code](https://css-tricks.com/creating-an-editable-textarea-that-supports-syntax-highlighted-code/) A neat tutorial that shows how we can create an editable textarea which supports syntax highlighting. [Read it ➡️](https://css-tricks.com/creating-an-editable-textarea-that-supports-syntax-highlighted-code/)
![SVG Shapes](/images/uploads/svg-shapes-double-border-min.png) [How to Add a Double Border to SVG Shapes](https://css-tricks.com/how-to-add-a-double-border-to-svg-shapes/) Ever wondered how to add a double border to SVG shapes? This tutorial shows us a few methods to achieve this! [Read it ➡️](https://css-tricks.com/how-to-add-a-double-border-to-svg-shapes/)
![Incremental Static Regeneration Article Card](/images/uploads/isr-min.png) [A Complete Guide To Incremental Static Regeneration (ISR) With Next.js](https://www.smashingmagazine.com/2021/04/incremental-static-regeneration-nextjs/) Incremental Static Regeneration (ISR) is a new evolution of the Jamstack, allowing you to update static content instantly without needing a full rebuild of your site. The hybrid approach of Next.js allows you to use ISR for e-commerce, marketing pages, blog posts, ad-backed media, and more. [Read it ➡️](https://www.smashingmagazine.com/2021/04/incremental-static-regeneration-nextjs/)
![Why Content Is Such A Fundamental Part Of The Web Design Process Article](/images/uploads/content-fundamental-web-design-process-min.jpeg) [Why Content Is Such A Fundamental Part Of The Web Design Process](https://www.smashingmagazine.com/2021/04/content-fundamental-part-web-design-process/) As designers, we are often burdened by the responsibility of producing and managing website content. It’s not our job to write it, but it’s not the client’s either. In many cases a vacuum emerges which ultimately gets filled with poor content. We can avert disaster by including content production in the design process. [Read it ➡️](https://www.smashingmagazine.com/2021/04/content-fundamental-part-web-design-process/)
![An In-Depth Guide To Measuring Core Web Vitals Article](/images/uploads/guide-measuring-core-web-vitals-min.jpeg) [An In-Depth Guide To Measuring Core Web Vitals](https://www.smashingmagazine.com/2021/04/complete-guide-measure-core-web-vitals/) How are Core Web Vitals measured? How do you know your fixes have had the desired effect and when will you see the results in Google Search Console? Let’s figure it out. [Read it ➡️](https://www.smashingmagazine.com/2021/04/complete-guide-measure-core-web-vitals/)
![Gatsby Source WordPress Plugin](/images/uploads/gatsby-source-wp-min.png) [Using New Gatsby Source WordPress Plugin](https://css-tricks.com/using-new-gatsby-source-wordpress-plugin/) The WPGraphQL plugin can be used to create a site that uses WordPress for content management, but with a front-end that’s driven by Gatsby. We call this a “decoupled” or “headless” CMS because the site’s back-end and front-end are separate entities that still talk to one another via APIs where components on the front end consume data from the CMS. [Check it out ➡️](https://css-tricks.com/using-new-gatsby-source-wordpress-plugin/)

short: A roundup of the latest web design & development news.
